mapper.select: SELECT s.offline_shop_id AS offlineShopId, s.name AS shopName, s.type AS shopType, ds.department_store_id AS departmentStoreId, ds.name AS departmentStoreName FROM offline_shop s LEFT JOIN department_store ds ON s.department_store_id = ds.department_store_id ORDER BY ds.department_store_id, s.offline_shop_id
SELECT type FROM offline_shop WHERE offline_shop_id = #{id}
